column1: I love Lincoln from the 100. I was so excited to see Ricky Whittle in Mistresses, I shouted ‘Age appropriate!’
I feel bad for really wanting Harry and Jos to get together
Justin wasn’t in the episode. Darn it….
The greatest disaster of a character to ever grace our screens is coming back tonight! Karen Kim, I’ve missed you!
Watching Karen Kim lose her mind is my new favorite thing.
